author: daxian-dbw
body:
We have a checklist for release: https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/maintainers/releasing.md#release-checklist.
However, it's out-dated. We need to define the release process with detailed tasks in the desired order so that anyone can onboard with the release easily.

The following tasks should be captured in addition to the exisitng tasks:
- trigger windows docker build
- release `.deb` and `.rpm` packages to microsoft YUM/APT repos
- update homebrew formula

We also need to think how much we can automate those tasks. So essentially we have two tasks to complete for this issue:
- [x] Update the exisitng docs
title: Need to define the release process with detailed tasks in the desired order
